title: Panic (ICE) in libsyntax/ext/quote.rs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Using a macro argument (e.g. $x) inside of quote_expr! causes an internal compiler error.
## Testcase

```
#![feature(quote)]                                                              
fn main() {                                                                     
    macro_rules! foo {                                                          
        ($bar:expr)  => {{                                                      
            quote_expr!(cx, {                                                   
                $bar                                                            
            })                                                                  
        }}                                                                      
    }                                                                           
    foo!(0);                                                                    
}                                                                               
```
## Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:

```
rustc 1.10.0-nightly (8da2bcac5 2016-04-28)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 8da2bcac5db1e091b90cceb19d0496f0f7501c88
commit-date: 2016-04-28
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.10.0-nightly
```
